name: NoiseDistribution
shortdesc: The distribution method to use when applying an Add Noise filter.

property.name: UNIFORM
property.shortdesc: Distributes color values of noise using random numbers between 0 and plus or minus the specified value, creating a subtle effect.

property.name: GAUSSIAN
property.shortdesc: Distributes color values of noise along a bell-shaped curve, creating a speckled effect.
